body.p:
Scottsville Allen County Ky
Third April May 1865
Thomas E Bramblette
Govr of Kentucky
Dear sir

Allow me a word upon the subject of a draft spoken of to Take effect with May pres month I would ask if you please To inform me the Kind of service If for County defence Exclusive or To the state service generally also the prinicpal of organizing such Companies I would like very much To assist or Be authorized To organize an Company for the local protection & general good of Allen County Ky

I am sir your obt friend & servent
Henry ,C, Watkins
Capt Co "E"
Late 52d Ky infty

Scottsville, Allen Co.
May 3, 1865.
Watkins, Capt. H. C.
To Governor
Asks information in regard to recruiting a Co. for the Active Militia in Allen County. "Is it for county defense, or for the state service generally?"
Ans May 9. 65 Let. Book p 98
Rec. In. Gen. Off. May 9/65
